titles: The state and dignitie of a secretarie of estates place, with the care and perill thereof, / written by the Right Honourable Robert late Earle of Salisbury. With his excellent instructions to the late Earle of Bedford, for the government of Barwick. A work worthy of memory.
author: Salisbury, Robert Cecil, Earl of, 1563-1612.
Burghley, William Cecil, Baron, 1520-1598.
notes: "Mr. Secretary's answer to the Earl of Bedford" (p. 5): signed: Will. Cecil.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Cabinet officers --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
